subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Four times a loser in global finals, Sri Lankan veteran Kumar Sangakkara broke his and his country's final jinx as he guided it to victory in the World T20 in Mirpur, Bangladesh.
snippet: Four times a loser in global finals, Sri Lankan veteran Kumar Sangakkara broke his and his country's final jinx as he guided it to victory in the World T20 in Mirpur, Bangladesh.
